org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.binder

Interface ContentNodeBinder<D,I,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - physical data node (e.g, Node) to which the ContentNode should bind.
    I - content item (e.g, ContentItem) used when filtering a content item (e.g, ContentItem).
    V - content value used when converting a value of ContentProperty.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJcrContentNodeBinder

    public interface ContentNodeBinder<D,I,V>
extends Serializable
    Content Node Binder interface, binding from a ContentNode to a physical data node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind(D dataNode, ContentNode source)
      Binds the source to the dataNode.
      void bind(D dataNode, ContentNode source, ContentNodeBindingItemFilter<I> itemFilter)
      Binds the source to the dataNode with the given itemFilter.
      void bind(D dataNode, ContentNode source, ContentNodeBindingItemFilter<I> itemFilter, ContentValueConverter<V> valueConverter)
      Binds the source to the dataNode with the given itemFilter and valueConverter.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        void bind(D dataNode,
          ContentNode source)
   throws ContentNodeBindingException
        Binds the source to the dataNode.
        Parameters:
        dataNode - physical data node to bind to.
        source - ContentNode source to bind from.
        Throws:
        ContentNodeBindingException - if content node binding exception occurs

      • bind

          ContentNode source,
          ContentNodeBindingItemFilter<I> itemFilter)
   throws ContentNodeBindingException
        Binds the source to the dataNode with the given itemFilter.
        Parameters:
        dataNode - physical data node to bind to.
        source - ContentNode source to bind from.
        itemFilter - content item filter
        Throws:
        ContentNodeBindingException - if content node binding exception occurs

      • bind

        void bind(D dataNode,
          ContentNode source,
          ContentNodeBindingItemFilter<I> itemFilter,
          ContentValueConverter<V> valueConverter)
   throws ContentNodeBindingException
        Binds the source to the dataNode with the given itemFilter and valueConverter.
        Parameters:
        dataNode - physical data node to bind to.
        source - ContentNode source to bind from.
        itemFilter - content item filter
        valueConverter - value converter
        Throws:
        ContentNodeBindingException - if content node binding exception occurs
